column4: iLoveWindows now there is a flamebait name if I ever saw one
I was thinking that maybe they should change their name as well
u think I should go to 9.10 or is it still too early?
Did we talk about it before or?
9.10 has some issues
randomusr   I don't think  saying Ext4 has loads of bugs is quite true
Your on 9.04 now or?
Many people have ended up with problems after upgrading 9.04 to 9.10.
Also if you check out the release notes you can find out about common 9.10 issues.
yes
some no problem,  but many problems after upgrading from 9.04
Bob1  in Windows yeah maybe,   in Ubuntu well only security updates from the default repos
dual booting 9.10 and 9.04?
basically yes, I have 9.10 on partition one.....installed 9.04 derivative (Jolicloud) on second partition.....did not install bootloader when doing that so it would not overwrite 9.10 version.....
ok so I guess you need to edit the file for Grub 2 so it can boot up 9.04 as well or something.  By the way why are you dual booting the two versions?
really like the Jolicloud for my daughter....cloud based, facebook etc.  nice interface too (like UNR but even slicker I feel)
jolicloud???
Ext4 in 9.04 hmm
well in your case something based on 9.04
Anyway in Ubuntu 9.04, Ext4 is not properly stable, because of the kernel they have and such.  Well it's been fine for me with 9.04.
http://www.jolicloud.com/
yeah thanks :)  something I can vm
plus I quite like Ubuntu 9.04, except a thing or two
